channel.title: How do i make an item owner only?
channel.description: how can i make an owner only so no other player can use it ?

item.title: How do i make an item owner only?
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

well i want it so i can only use it so how would i do that?

item.title: How do i make an item owner only?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

You could add something into process which deletes the item if they arenâ€™t owner, Eg:

if (playerHasItem(ID)) {
if (playerRights < 3) {
deleteItem(ID, ItemSlot);
} else {
}
}

^ Something like that would delete the item if they had it and it was owners only.

If you want it so only an owner can obtain it, thats easy because you just put an if statement for what their playerRights are. I hope i helped in some way.
